bull market

sentences.english: In technical side, short and mid-term technical indicators keep on rise.
sentences.chinese: 技术面，短期及中期各项技术指标保持多头强势状态。

sentences.english: This system can be extended to realize the multi-center data acquisition, and the measurement of many-headed ignition coil.
sentences.chinese: 将此系统进行扩展可实现多头点火线圈的测试。

sentences.english: And well, of course, the Dutch can't eat all these pigs.
sentences.chinese: 当然，荷兰人不可能吃完那么多头猪。

sentences.english: A multipronged approach could address that dilemma. Like Mr.
sentences.chinese: 或许多头并进的手段可以化解这个难题。

sentences.english: The driving mechanism further realizes flexible winding of multi-head cords.
sentences.chinese: 也可使多头线绳实现柔性卷绕。

sentences.english: Bob, because he is buying the underlying, is said to have entered a long forward contract.
sentences.chinese: 由于鲍勃是购标人，所以说他签订了多头期货合同。

sentences.english: Larvae often aggregate in one root and overwinter in stems and roots.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫常多头聚集危害同一株沙蒿。

sentences.english: However, there is one thing the bulls have that the bears do not: seasonality .
sentences.chinese: 不过多头有一个独享的利好因素，那就是季节性因素。

sentences.english: "Xiao Li" men mostly use black kerchiefs , whereas the women will not wear the headband.
sentences.chinese: “侾”黎男子多头裹黑巾，大部分妇女平时不戴头巾。

sentences.english: This system can be extended to realize the multi-center data acquisition, and the measurement of man…
sentences.chinese: 将此系统进行扩展可实现多头点火线圈的测试。

sentences.english: The establishment of long or short position through buy-in or sell-out.
sentences.chinese: 通过买进或卖出来建立多头或空头仓位。

sentences.english: The normality was tested by analysing 12 metric characters of 200 female ducks.
sentences.chinese: 对200多头母鸭的12个计量性状进行了正态测验。

sentences.english: When the price breaks below the low of the two previous calendar weeks, liquidate your long position and sell short.
sentences.chinese: 当价格低于前2周的最低价时，平掉多头仓位并做空。
